title: Fan, 19th century
medium: Medium: paper and wood, painted in watercolor
description: Fan leaf painted in the design of brightly colored flowers and birds on grey ground dusted with metals. On the reverse, flowers on a yellow ground. Sticks and guards are painted black.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fan, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: paper and wood, painted in watercolor. Gift of Mary T. Cockcroft. 1944-44-1.
